title: Summer Jobs for Teens Come With Tax Traps and Benefits
sub_head: Young workers’ first paychecks can offer a great introduction to one of life’s few certainties. Here’s what they—and their parents—need to know about that first brush with the IRS.
body:
Summer is almost here, bringing temporary jobs for young Americans—and a first brush with U.S. taxes.
Many summer workers won’t owe income tax because they don’t earn enough, even in a hot job market. But they’ll often owe Social Security and Medicare taxes, and perhaps state and local levies as well.
